item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0328; 07:57AM; 350 N Hayworth Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/36O6AWT; Beverly Grove; Firefighters coordinated their interior fire attack with vertical ventilation efforts above. It took 48 firefighters 35 minutes to extinguish the flames in an apparently vacant two-story fourplex. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM22 E203 E226 E227 E229 E261 E27 E29 E294 E52 E58 E61 E68 E97 EA2 EM11 RA27 RA68 RA861 T26 T27 T29 T3 T61 T94 UR3; CH7; 13 15 16; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0328; 07:22AM; 350 N Hayworth Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/36O6AWT; Beverly Grove; Two-story fourplex with smoke showing. Offensive mode.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC1 BC11 BC18 BC5 CM22 E203 E226 E227 E229 E261 E27 E29 E294 E52 E58 E61 E68 E97 EM11 RA27 RA68 RA861 T26 T27 T29 T3 T61 T94 UR3; CH9; 13 15; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0157; 04:14AM; 17830 W Sherman Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uGK4qO; Reseda; Ninety-six firefighters battled flames in a three-story center-hallway apartment building, while assisting residents with evacuation and/or sheltering in place. It took 58 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the fire. Firefighter-paramedics transported one patient to the hospital. The cause of the fire is under investigation. PIO Captain Cody Weireter en route, ETA 5:25am.; FS 100; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 3; AR1 AR11 BC10 BC14 BC15 BC17 CM42 E100 E103 E27 E273 E287 E288 E289 E290 E293 E73 E90 E93 EA1 EM14 EM15 EM17 EM9 HR3 PI3 RA100 RA104 RA73 RA83 RA889 RA90 RA903 RA93 T73 T87 T88 T89 T90 T93 UR88 UR89; CH8; 17 18; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0178; 04:07AM; 6900 S Knowlton Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wVn7CR; Westchester; The fire appeared to have originated with a dryer in a second-floor laundry room of the two-story apartment building. 26 firefighters worked to contain the flames to the room-of-origin, extinguishing the fire in 19 minutes. Occupants sheltered in place to avoid any smoke hazard. No reported injuries. The cause of the fire is under investigation. ; FS 5; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E295 E51 E95 RA5 RA95 T5 T95; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0178; 03:48AM; 6900 S Knowlton Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wVn7CR; Westchester; Two-story apartment with heavy smoke showing from the second floor. Offensive mode.; FS 5; Batt 4; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC4 E205 E295 E51 E95 RA5 RA95 T5 T95; CH9; 13; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0157; 03:16AM; 17830 W Sherman Wy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3uGK4qO; Reseda; Three-story center-hallway apartment with fire showing. At least one patient in need of medical attention. Agency Assist; INC#1396; 07:12PM; 4730 N Crystal Springs Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3K0gh2G; Griffith Park; Park Rangers requested LAFD assistance for a body recovery at or near Griffith Park. Due to the location and light conditions, the Incident Commander has determined a "short haul" hoist will be the best course of action to relocate the victim for law enforcement and Coroner to continue their investigations. ; FS 56; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E27 E56 E90 H1 HA1 T27 UR27; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Hiker Rescue; INC#0816; 01:07PM; 7193 W Mulholland Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/38bH12d; Hollywood Hills; One injured adult male hiker (in fair condition) has been safely hoisted from his remote location by LAFD Air Ops and taken to a local hospital.; FS 76; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC5 E227 E290 E97 H1 H6 HA1 HA6 HH97 RA97 RH114 T27 T90; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1173; 04:28PM; 320 S Coronado St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Nx6gw9; Westlake; KNOCKDOWN: 45 firefighters extinguished the fire in 28 minutes with no injuries reported. The fire extended into the attic but was contained to the unit of origin. All occupants were out of the unit prior to LAFD arrival and one adult female was evaluated but she declined transport. The Incident Commander requested LAFD Arson for the investigation. No further details.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 BC5 E11 E13 E20 E203 E211 E220 E6 EM11 RA11 RA6 RA811 SQ21 T11 T20 T3; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1173; 04:00PM; 320 S Coronado St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Nx6gw9; Westlake; Two story, four-plex with fire showing from one unit on the 2nd floor. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 11; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 BC5 E13 E20 E203 E211 E220 E6 RA11 RA811 SQ21 T11 T20 T3; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart
